name: Covid-19 - Survive the infection
description:
Before you start the game, take a minute to thank or pray for all the people who fight against this virus in the hospital or elsewhere.

This is an action game that you have to fight against the virus to survive. 

This is a smooth action game with the objective to fight against the covid-19. It's really relaxing killing these monsters who want to arm you. You will found 3 types of enemies. Melee monster, summoner and range enemy.  That was an incredible journey for me to learn game development. I Hope you will have a lot of fun to play my first game. 

There is 3 type of weapons.
-crossbow : fast with less damage.
-bubbles : fast rate, slow projectile with more damage.
-vaccine: : high damage, low rate of fire and fast projectile.

Level
If you are older, you will have more difficulties to fight the virus.

Newborn = easy
Youngster = medium
Grown-up = hard
Oldster = Harder

The mobile version will be soon available.

Thanks to BlackThorn production for the incredible tutorial on Udemy that gave me a lot of knowledge.
tutorial : https://www.udemy.com/course/creating-a-cool-2d-action-game-in-unity/

If you want to learn unity, you should start with this.

If you have comments for improving this game, you are welcome. 

With your support i hope to create better games.
